description:
Lum encounters a jungle boy who falls madly in love with her after it`s discovered that he`s impervious to her electric shocks! Ataru and the gang soon learn why a little shock means nothing to this kid.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come Quickly, Darling! Lum`s Dangerous Marriage Talk
早くきてダーリン! ラムの危険な結婚話
